Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Wheel brake assembly seizure. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
Date: 23/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma
